price: 39. [Allahas tarė Suleimanui (Saliamonui)]: „Tai Mūsų dovana, taigi eikvok arba sulaikyk, nebus prašoma (tavęs) atsiskaityti.“
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
